data.title: Open - MYBA Charter Show
data.text: Corpo delle Capitanerie di Porto di Genova EUROPE’S LEADING CHARTER YACHTS MYBA Marina Molo Vecchio Genova Italy April 30 - May 4 2012 Charter Show WITH THE PATRONAGE OF Polizia di Frontiera Autorità Portuale Camera di Commercio di Genova di Genova Associazione Agenti Raccomandatari Mediatori Marittimi Agenti Aerei (ASSAGENTI) MYBA Charter Show organised by on behalf of All Yachting s.a.s. Porto Antico SpA Comune di Genova PlACEd RIGHT IN THE CENTRE OF lIGuRIA, GENOA IS THE HEART ANd THE INTEllECTuAl CAPITAl OF THE ITAlIAN RIvIERA LET GENOA BEWITCH YOU WITH ITS TRULY UNIQUE INSIGHT INTO ITALY’S PAST AND PRESENT MYBA Charter Show at MARINA MOLO VECCHIO - Genoa Discover Genoa’s Artistic UNESCO heritage! You will be surprised by the allure of the city’s old medieval centre and its unusual mix of elegant palaces and small artisans’ workshops, precious ateliers and lively “osterie” and pubs. The different architectural styles, together with the bright colours of the old fishermen houses create an inimitable atmosphere that is difficult to forget. Take some time to visit some of the Rolli palaces designated in World Heritage by UNESCO such as Palazzo Rosso or Bianco located in the fascinating Via Garibaldi where lots of art exhibitions take place. Just outside the MYBA area you can also enjoy a walk along the city’s historic port and the newer dockside area where the aquarium and the Sea Museum are located. Take advantage of the city tours organized during the show to discover the city’s most hidden jewels and treasures! We hope you will enjoy our city as much as we do! Buon divertimento! The Mayor of Genoa welcomes MYBA 2012 Partecipants Marta vicenzi Mayor of Genoa On behalf of the city of Genoa, I am delighted and honoured to salute the 24th MYBA Charter Show, whose importance is witnessed by the growing appreciation among exhibitors and visitors. I would like to thank the MYBA Association as well as Pesto Sea Group, Marina Molo vecchio and the Associazione Agenti raccomandatari mediatori marittimi of Genoa for the organisation. The City of Genoa has been hosting this important event since 2001 with great success. I am proud of the role that Genoa has been able to keep along these years.In the last administrative course the Municipality has attributed particular importance to accomplishing Genoa’s makeover. I think it is necessary to increase and reorganize the port facilities on a grand scale, and to redefine the equilibrium between urban organism and port. This is the reason why we have worked out a new general town planning scheme supported by the great architect Renzo Piano’s waterfront project. let me take this opportunity to warmly welcome you to Genoa, nominated a unesco World Heritage site. In my capacity as the city Mayor I would like to thank you very much for being here and wish you all the best for the forthcoming event. BREAKING NEWS FROM MYBA CHAIR WOMAN Jacqui lockhart, Select Charter Services, Chairwoman MYBA Boat Show Committe dear Show Attendees, As Chairwoman of the Charter Boat Show Committee, it is my pleasure to welcome you to Genoa for the 2012 MYBA Charter Show. Again, we have an outstanding collection of charter yachts available for viewing and I would like to thank the captains and their crew for all their hard work in presenting their yachts. I would also like to thank our sponsors and exhibitors whose support and participation is much appreciated. Please take the time to read the show schedule for the week again. One again, the Gala dinner will be held at the spectacular villa lo Zerbino on Tuesday evening and we hope you will join us for another enjoyable evening. I would also like to thank the Pesto Sea Group for their continued support and excellent organisation of this impressive event. I would particularly like to thank Francesca Carbone whose support is invaluable. A Big Thank You to the members of the Committee as well as MYBA Admin for their hard work and support throughout the year. I wish you all an enjoyable and productive show and look forward to seeing you all throughout the week. The MYBA Charter Show 2013 will be held from April 29 – May 3 in Genoa. We look forward to seeing you there!
